linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS (might work on different distros/version)
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD, 1.7 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card (Vulkan)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internal tests made on Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS, if you encounte any issues - please let us know!
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS (might work on different distros/version)
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD, 1.7 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660ti or better (that's 2012 card!)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internal tests made on Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS, if you encounte any issues - please let us know!

name: Blaze in Space: Beat a-maze Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD, 1.7 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: In our tests game run at 120 fps on gtx 660ti (that's 2012 card!) in high settings 1080p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10, 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.1 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660ti or better (that's 2012 card!)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: In our tests game run at 120 fps on gtx 660ti (that's 2012 card!) in high settings 1080p

short_description: Modern arcade with a puzzle twist. Guide your spaceship through a neon maze. Think quick and keep the momentum to beat other players!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Ukrainian, Hindi, Arabic, Turkish, Indonesian, Czech, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Basque, Belarusian
